title: Your main is disappointed in you over something, what is it?
body:
I'll start:

{{champion:267}} She's disappointed because I'm a terrible swimmer and can't hold my breath for very long. (I CAN swim, but I'm self taught and the form and breathing are horrible) 

Your turn! I can't wait to see some of the hilarious things you guys come up with!

replies.body: {{champion:131}} "What do you mean by people walked on the Moon?"
This one is especially good! Love it.
{{champion:27}}  because im Jewish.
? It can't be what i think
It's exactly what you think. That's why it's funny.
{{champion:117}}  I'm colorblind
pffffffftttt
{{champion:201}} Not taking enough time to rest between games
{{champion:102}} disappointed because I like dragons
I dont understand, why would she be upset about that? She is a dragon isn't she?
Would you like them if they all wished to kill you because they saw you as an abomination? Would you like them if they branded you an outcast because of how you were conceived?

Shyvana is an example of why League of Legends has excellent story potential. The personal struggles of some of the characters can be really engaging and get tons of people invested. Even the bits of lore from champion pages can be enough motivation to play, let-alone main a champion. 

I myself would like to see how some of these stories progress? What happens while Shyvana fights for Demacia? What will happen when Nasus and Renekton cross paths after centuries? Does Yasuo ever find out who killed his master? And why are they constantly fighting in a battlefield, controlled by invisible beings who may or may not exist?

I still don't get it, why she would be disappointed.

You like dragons, so you wouldn't mind her being different from humans.

She doesn't like dragons because of the reasons I stated above. She was branded an outcast at birth because of her "impure blood" and the only dragon she has ever met that accepted humans was her father and even then, a dragon hunting Shyvana came in and killed him, giving her yet another reason to dislike dragons

Speculation.

There is nothing like that in her lore and I don't remember anything about her disliking dragons in her AMA.

Quite the contrary, she despised her human side thinking it was weak, before running into Jarvan.
{{champion:14}} **DEMACIAN SCUM**
He'd hate that I'm a weakling who could barely jog.

{{champion:103}} You missed charm again...
me: I'm sorry! I'm sorry! ;.;
{{champion:103}} You seriously need to stop doing that. You'll never get anywhere if you keep missing my charms <3
me: ...are you hitting on me?
{{champion:103}} no
me: darn...
{{champion:13}} He hates how much time I waste.
{{champion:25}} Every time she finds out I still live with my parents...
{{champion:266}} disappointed at the fact i've never been to war.
{{champion:412}}  I have no clue of final part of what he says when you pick him at champ select. "So delightful as you wshhlfikt" wtf is that?

Isn't it "What delightful agony we shall inflict?".

Haven't palyed him in i while, but i think its something like that :)
What delightfull agony we shall infilct

{{champion:121}} : I am religious kappa

{{champion:11}} Sorry I suck at bladework.

{{champion:82}} I don't like undeads pls

{{champion:41}} I don't like oranges.
I don't really dislike them either, but I don't love them the way GP does.

{{champion:21}} 

She's disappointed because I can't pick out a cute bra that fits her bust.

> [{quoted}](name=Busty Demoness,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=xlAGtrxf,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2016-09-08T23:10:20.240+0000)
>
> {{champion:21}} 
> 
> She's disappointed because I can't pick out a cute bra that fits her bust.

How do you find a bra that big anyways?
Usually on custom order.
{{champion:161}}  is upset that i dont have any real knowledge for him. im an imbecile. D:
I got a pentakill in a game {{champion:202}}
dont worry you have four up votes

> [{quoted}](name=cyberchade,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=xlAGtrxf,comment-id=00220000,timestamp=2016-09-10T02:52:07.399+0000)
>
> dont worry you have four up votes

I believe again.
{{champion:157}}  I didn't face the wind
{{champion:29}} I took a shower
{{champion:203}} Playing the new Fire Emblem games on Casual difficulty.
For shame... >.> *replaces own casual difficulty save with a new game on classic*

{{champion:63}} 
I'm not an arsonist.
I can't taste colours :'(
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
My main is mad that it's taking so long to meet them
Is this a joke about not choosing a main yet? I thought your main was Shaco?

I did once, but I've lost my touch with him, I can't play him anymore sadly

Thus I am on the quest of discovery once more
{{champion:20}}  because you apparently like inflicting suffering on the other jungler.

Fun fact, Nunu is the only champion I have ever seriously hated playing and have ever seriously hated a champion kit

So fuck that
I'm with you on that... it's not even hit kit that's the problem. It's his bloody voice -__-
That too... I know he's a kid but sonic voice actors are better
{{champion:81}} I need a ~~mini~~map D:
